marklogic.body:
None of their plans are working. Even a CBS poll say women support religious freedom over forcing religious organizations to pay for med. ins. provisions that offend that religion.
Killing energy so we will be like some mediocre Middle Eastern nation in stature isn't working either. See a Meet the Press, Sept. 7, 2008, where the o says he doesn't Pledge allegiance to the flag because he has hated America, will de-militarize the US until it is no better than any other nation, and has been part of flag-Burning protests. This is to repay Am. for disrespecting Islam.
Sept 7, 2008, Meet the Press; he said what he was going to do and has tried to do it. $5 a gal. of gas is just a start.
To stop this madness VOTE ANYBODY BUT OBAMA IN 2012.
